2025-08-12T15:46:00.CONTENT_EN:
Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that as informed by the Mainland Railway Authorities, the destination of High Speed Rail train G3008 on 13 August 2025 travelling to Xiamen Station will change to Chaoshan Station due to typhoon. 
Trains affected:
G3008 (will arrive at Chaoshan Station)

For the latest train schedules, please refer to the 12306 official website (12306. cn) or mobile app. Citizens may also check latest train information from the HSR website, mobile app or see the information provided at Hong Kong West Kowloon Station.
2025-08-12T15:46:00.CONTENT_CN:
運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知，內地鐵路單位通報，受颱風影響，2025年8月13日原定前往廈門的高速鐵路列車車次G3008，終到站更改為潮汕站。
受影響車次:
G3008
(終到站更改為潮汕站)

有關車次的資料，請留意12306官方網站(12306.cn)或手機應用程式。市民亦可留意於高速鐵路網頁、手機應用程式或香港西九龍站發放的最新資訊。

2025-08-13T20:19:00.CONTENT_EN:
Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that as informed by the Mainland Railway Authorities, some High Speed Rail train services on 14 Aug 2025 traveling between Hong Kong West Kowloon Station and the Mainland have been cancelled or had their departing station and destination changed due to typhoon. 

Cancelled Train Service:
South Bound Trains:
G6541 / G5609 / G3001
North Bound Trains:
G6542 / G3006 / G3002

Departing Station/Destination Changed:
G6524 / G6574 (Arrive at Chaoshan Station)
G6523 / G6573 (Departure from Chaoshan Station)

For the latest train schedules, please refer to the 12306 official website (12306. cn) or mobile app. Passengers may also check latest train information from the HSR website, mobile app or see the information provided at Hong Kong West Kowloon Station. 

Passengers may also consider taking the East Rail Line to Lo Wu/ Lok Ma Chau or using other transport to enter the Mainland. 

For ticket refunds, please refer to the High Speed Rail website and process within the time stated.
2025-08-13T20:19:00.CONTENT_CN:
運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知，內地鐵路單位通報，受颱風影響，2025年08月14日部分來往香港西九龍站及內地的高速鐵路列車車次取消或需要更改始發站及終到站。
已取消的車次:
南行列車車次:
G6541 /G5609 /G3001
北行列車車次:
G6542 /G3006 /G3002

更改始發站及終到站的車次:
G6524 /G6574 (終到站更改為潮汕站)
G6523 /G6573 (始發站更改為潮汕站)

有關車次的資料，請留意12306官方網站(12306.cn)或手機應用程式。乘客亦可留意高速鐵路網頁、手機應用程式或香港西九龍站發放的最新資訊。

乘客可考慮乘搭東鐵綫經羅湖/落馬洲，或使用其他跨境交通工具前往內地。

如需退票，請參閱高速鐵路網頁並於指定日期內辦理。

2025-08-14T06:00:00.CONTENT_EN: Amber Rainstorm Warning Signal is in force. Due to wet weather and slippery roads, Transport Department appeals motorists and the commuters to: i. plan the journey in advance; ii. allow more traveling time; iii. drive with extra care and patience; and iv. take heed of traffic situation particularly at busy junctions with obstructive views.
2025-08-14T06:00:00.CONTENT_CN: 黃色暴雨警告信號現已生效，天雨路滑，運輸署呼籲駕駛人士及乘客須: i.提早計劃行程路線； ii.預留充裕時間出門； iii.小心駕駛及保持忍讓；及 iv.留意交通情況，特别在視線受阻的繁忙路口。

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 機場管理局 早上繁忙時段

2025-08-14T08:02:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to heavy traffic at the road section leading from Airport Road to Hong Kong International Airport’s Terminal 1 Departures Kerb, motorists are advised to use the drop-off area at the Airport’s Car Park 1. Members of the public heading to the Airport are advised to allow sufficient time for their journey and consider taking the Airport Express and buses.
2025-08-14T08:02:00.CONTENT_CN: 現時機場路通往香港國際機場一號客運大樓離港層落客區的路段交通繁忙，駕駛人士請考慮改用機場一號停車場落客區。前往機場的市民，請預留足夠交通時間，並考慮乘搭機場快綫或巴士。

2025-08-14T08:34:00.CONTENT_EN:
Some entrances/exits of Hong Kong West Kowloon Station closed

Due to adverse weather conditions, Entrance/Exit C at Hong Kong West Kowloon Station is closed for preventive purpose. Please use other entrances/exits. 


High Speed Rail train service remains normal.
2025-08-14T08:34:00.CONTENT_CN:
香港西九龍站部分出入口暫時關閉

由於天氣情況惡劣，香港西九龍站C出入口暫時關閉以作預防措施，請使用其他出入口。

高速鐵路服務維持正常。

2025-08-14T11:35:00.CONTENT_EN: Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that Entrance/Exit C of Hong Kong West Kowloon Station is reopened.
2025-08-14T11:35:00.CONTENT_CN: 運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知，香港西九龍站C出入口重新開放。

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Bus services affected by adverse weather
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 受惡劣天氣影響的巴士服務安排

2025-08-14T12:38:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to the adverse weather, the bus services arrangement are as follows: CTB Suspended: H1、H1S、H2、H3、H4 Limited Service：6、6X、9、14、15、63、66、73、260、973
2025-08-14T12:38:00.CONTENT_CN: 因受惡劣天氣影響，以下巴⼠服務安排如下： 城巴 暫停⾏駛：H1、H1S、H2、H3、H4 有限度服務：6、6X、9、14、15、63、66、73、260、973
